text: @realDonaldTrump If not, “act” like an American and wear a damn mask! 😷😷😷😷😷 if not, f**k off! You deserve to get Covid19 and I never wish bad on anyone. You’re “unfortunately” the POTUS and your worried about how you look in one! Personally, I think covering your face looks MUCH better! 🤡😷
